title: Green tech startups see boost in patents and investment when partnering with government

title_detail.value: Green tech startups see boost in patents and investment when partnering with government

summary: Collaboration between government and startups could help meet the climate challenge while growing small businesses. Findings could inform discussions on Green New Deal or any 'forward-looking policy package', say researchers.

summary_detail.value: Collaboration between government and startups could help meet the climate challenge while growing small businesses. Findings could inform discussions on Green New Deal or any 'forward-looking policy package', say researchers.
